title: Rematriculation
contents: Last day students can re-matriculate ($50) for the Fall 2021 semesters.

title: Semester Cancellation
contents: Last day students can drop all classes via SOLAR.

title: Late Registration
contents: $50 fee if not enrolled in at least one class before semester start.

title: Late Registration Ends
contents: Last day to process enrollment changes (adds, swaps, credit changes) via SOLAR. Last day to drop or submit LOA/Term Withdrawal without a "W" (withdraw) recorded on transcript.

title: Ugrd. Students enrolling in Grad courses
contents: Last day to petition to the Graduate School

title: Graduation Application
contents: Last day for Fall and Winter degree candidates to apply for graduation via SOLAR

title: Section/Credit Change Form
contents: Last day to submit a Section/Credit Change Form. Changes must be processed by 4:00 PM. After this date petition is required and “W” (withdrawal) will be recorded on transcript

title: GPNC
contents: Last day students can select Grade/Pass/No Credit (GPNC). Changes must be processed by 4:00 PM. Non- petitionable.

title: Course Withdrawal
contents: Last day students can process a withdrawal from individual course(s) via SOLAR. "W" (withdrawal) will be recorded on transcript. Changes must be processed by 4:00 pm

title: LOA/Term Withdrawal
contents: Last day to take a leave of absence or withdraw from the University. Students must submit the Semester Withdrawal Form
